general general: It's a great day to lie down and soak up the sun's rays. You take advantage of it.
You spend some time with r_w today. The two of you enjoy the time away from camp.
Today is a good day to spend with the elders. r_e is thrilled that you've come to join them.

r_q is looking worn out. You offer to watch the pups for a bit so {PRONOUN/r_q/subject} can take a rest. r_q is thrilled and accepts. When {PRONOUN/r_q/subject} {VERB/r_q/come/comes} back later the pups are napping and r_q looks much better.
You help out with a few den repairs this cycle. The camp looks much better in the end, and should be good for another cycle.
It's a dreary day today. r_w1 and r_w2 just came back from patrol and are sheltered beside you. The three of you share tongues for a bit, grooming out damp fur.
Lightning is striking in the sky. You watch it with r_d, r_w1, r_w2, and r_m.
r_d visits you after you had a very cross conversation with r_w.
You're out with r_a and r_w today. You're not on patrol, really, all of you just wanted to stretch your legs.
A Clan meeting has your attention. Danger in the territory means every slugcat should be on high alert this cycle.
Scavengers on the territory have the Clan nervous. You reassure r_q and r_e that they won't find the camp.
r_k is causing trouble - and you're the first one on the scene. With a fond sigh you herd {PRONOUN/r_k/object} back to the nursery.
The Clan is having a lazy sunhigh. You end up chatting with r_w1, r_w2, and r_m about nothing in particular.
Gossip isn't necessarily good... But it sure can be fun. r_d always has the best info so you spend some time with {PRONOUN/r_d/object}.
r_w1 is chatting with r_w2. You listen in as you eat your evening meal. Seems like r_w3 has annoyed r_w1...
r_q and the pups have left a bit of a mess with whatever game they were playing. You decide to clean up, and later, r_q is incredibly grateful.
r_w is talking about a pet {PRONOUN/r_w/subject} met on patrol. You recall that pet as well. Small world!

You're helping r_m since {PRONOUN/r_m/subject} needed extra paws. {PRONOUN/r_m/subject/CAP}{VERB/r_m/'re/'s} grateful to you for the assistance, and it turns out to be a great opportunity to connect with {PRONOUN/r_m/object} more.
It's time to clean out your nest! Fresh moss is great, but you will miss the bits of fluff and feathers. r_q seems to notice your unhappiness and offers some of {PRONOUN/r_q/poss} supply for you!
r_d notices you're a little down. {PRONOUN/r_d/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_d/spend/spends} quite a bit of time talking through some things with you. By the end, a weight has been lifted off your shoulders.
r_m notices you looking tired. You reassure {PRONOUN/r_m/object} that you're fine but relent when {PRONOUN/r_m/subject} {VERB/r_m/give/gives} you some herbs to help you sleep.
l_n is looking deep in thought. You offer to hear {PRONOUN/l_n/object} out about whatever it is bothering {PRONOUN/l_n/object}.
A stroll today has let you discover a hidden gem of an area on the territory. Maybe you can use this as a nice hideaway on occasion!
Some time today was well spent lost in your own thoughts. Reflection is always a useful tool.
What you think of r_w has become relevant today within the Clan. Why is every slugcat so nosy?
After noticing you being quiet today, r_d comes over to check in with you. A pleasant conversation boosts your mood.
r_a seems to be having a very hard time lately. You extend some kindness to {PRONOUN/r_a/object}, and {PRONOUN/r_a/subject}{VERB/r_a/'re/'s} soon bouncing back thanks to you.
You stop to take in the moment. What a moon it's been. What a time to be you!
Did you just see something out the corner of your eyes? Or have you just spooked yourself for no good reason?
You trip on your way to the fresh-kill pile. Half the Clan saw it, but r_w is nice enough to help you play it off. Whew!
There's fun to be had this cycle! l_n had suggested playing some games as a Clan. Your team won!
With your spear sharpened and fur glistening, you feel like you could conquer the world today! Until someone points out a straying tuft of fur...
r_w shakes you awake. {PRONOUN/r_w/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_w/tell/tells} you to stop sleeping. You were having such a nice dream though!
r_a is being scolded by d_n. After a moment's consideration you end up distracting d_n to let r_a catch a break.
A buzzing fly is being annoying. It ends up being caught in your keen paws for it's crime of being bothersome.
What an unusual gold butterfly! Strange... Maybe it's a sign? You ponder it for a bit.
r_w is going on and on and on about a really cool cloud. You're caught yawning at the tale, and r_w is cross for a few days. Oops?
You look to the stars one evening and ponder. Are The Ascended really watching?
You look to the night sky one evening and wonder if the darkness is the Rot Wound's influence.
The camp is abuzz with chatter. Seems like l_n and d_n had an argument, and it's the talk of the Clan!
general assertive: You're one of the most confident slugcats in the Clan and you know it! Nothing could make you back down from a challenge... Even though you end up on dawn patrol after losing. Worth it.
r_w1 is talking behind your back. When r_w2 informs you, you strut right up to r_w1 to confront them. r_d has to quickly step in.
r_d is trying to speak to you about what you said to r_a earlier. You remind {PRONOUN/r_d/object} that you don't mince words.
r_a is raring for a good spar. You offer to train with {PRONOUN/r_a/object} for a bit... But by the end r_a is a bit bruised. {PRONOUN/r_d/subject/CAP} don't ask again. r_a's loss!
r_k is admiring you it seems! It's probably because of your boldness. Or maybe that you're confident? You're also pretty fierce and...
When a lizard finds the camp, you're one of the first to launch at it with a yowl. Your sheer confidence unnerves the lizard enough to send it away.
Bragging is unbecoming, r_w says. You turn your nose at {PRONOUN/r_w/object}. It's not bragging if it's true! It's sharing your accomplishments!
You may have bitten off more than you could chew this time. l_n and d_n are looking quite cross as you're called aside. Who tattled?!
You're shining as bright as the Void itself! Nothing can stop you. Not even The Ascended nor the Rot Wound could dull how you feel!
Showing off your scars is always a fun time. r_k is enthralled by each story attached to {PRONOUN/r_k/object}.
When a storm blows in, you're the first to volunteer to get to work ensuring the camp is secure.
general introspective: There's nothing like waking up early to watch the sun rise and feel the morning breeze against your fur! And, naturally, it's the perfect environment to think about anything and everything.

You stumbled across a yellow flower that seemed to follow the sunshine as time passed. It almost seems poetic - romantic. A rooted plant following their untouchable and unrequited love, unable to survive without them.
Some days you just wish your mind would stop thinking. It's a bit ironic that you can be annoyed of yourself.
You wonder if other slugcats think you talk too much or think too often. Do they find you annoying? A know-it-all? Harboring too many opinions?
You can't help but find dislike_r_w's urchin-like appearance fitting, considering {PRONOUN/dislike_r_w/poss} prickly personality.
general sweet: You take the time to sort through the fresh-kill pile, making sure to throw away any old or rotting pieces of prey.
general unlawful: You take the last piece of fresh-kill from the pile before r_k could get to it.
general rare: r_m takes you aside quietly. {PRONOUN/r_m/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_m/seem/seems} concerned and {VERB/r_m/begin/begins} to speak about something before shaking {PRONOUN/r_m/poss} head and telling you not to mind {PRONOUN/r_m/object}. You wonder what made r_m stop...
You overhear l_n speaking about you. It seems quite serious.
d_n is looking at you strangely. You pause to ask {PRONOUN/d_n/object}, but {PRONOUN/d_n/subject} {VERB/d_n/shake/shakes} {PRONOUN/d_n/poss} head and quietly {VERB/d_n/walk/walks} away. Weird.

When r_d takes you aside, you expect a few things. None of them happen though, as {PRONOUN/r_d/subject} simply {VERB/r_d/study/studies} you for a few moments before {PRONOUN/r_d/subject} {VERB/r_d/walk/walks} away. What was that..?
There's an uneasiness in the camp today. A gold butterfly was found torn up in the clearing. No one seems to know anything, but every slugcat agrees it probably isn't a good sign...
